name: Black Out
overview: BLACK OUT can be played alone or in pairs. In game, the Computer places a variety of furniture in a room - the number of can be entered before the game starts. Then the light is turned off in the room-and to get Points, you now run as quickly as possible through the room. Woe, though, when the furniture is run around. This costs time and thus points. A lot of fun and entertainment - and, if possible, no Black Out.
